short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension to prevent you from getting unwanted spoilers on social networking websites.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Game of Thrones season 7 is about to start and all GOT fans are less afraid of the White Walkers and more afraid of SPOILERS !!! This extension is simple. It hides possible spoilers on Facebook and Twitter. Some of them may not be spoilers but hey, better safe than sorry, right?

You can still see the content behind the spoiler by clicking on it.

This is still work in progress and future versions will prevent spoilers for other famous TV shows.

Feedback is welcomed.
